an4.83:1.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.83:1.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism,
an4.83:1.4: and they criticize those deserving of praise.
an4.83:1.5: They arouse faith in things that are dubious, and they don’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
an4.83:1.6: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.83:2.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.83:2.3: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism,
an4.83:2.4: and they praise those deserving of praise.
an4.83:2.5: They don’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,
an4.83:2.6: and they do arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
an4.83:2.7: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
